tasks.dev: deno task dev:api & deno task dev:vite
tasks.build: deno task build:client && deno task build:server
tasks.build:server: deno run -A --node-modules-dir npm:vite build --ssr src/entry-server.js --outDir dist/server
tasks.preview: deno run -A npm:cross-env NODE_ENV=production && deno run -A server.js
tasks.serve: deno task dev:api & deno run --allow-net --allow-read jsr:@std/http@1/file-server --port 8080 dist/
